greetings.WELCOME_DESC: It sets the welcome message. If you leave it blank it shows the welcome message.
greetings.NOT_SET_WELCOME:
*‚öôÔ∏è You don't set the welcome message yet.!*

*To set:* >> *.welcome hi how are you?* 

<< *Variables* >>
```{pp} - to send welcome message with new user pp 
{gif} - send welcome with your gif 
{gname} - get group name 
{gdesc} - get group discription 
{gowner} - get group owner's jid 
{botowner} - get bot owner's name```

 _‚Ä¢ Use "#" to Rule down ‚Ä¢_
greetings.NEED_WELCOME_TEXT:
*You must write a message to set up the welcome message.*

*Example:* *.welcome hi && hi#how are you?* 

<< *Variables* >>
```{pp} - to send welcome message with new user pp 
{gif} - send welcome with your gif 
{gname} - get group name 
{gdesc} - get group discription 
{gowner} - get group owner's jid 
{botowner} - get bot owner's name```

 _‚Ä¢ Use "#" to Rule down ‚Ä¢_
greetings.GOODBYE_DESC: Sets the goodbye message. If you leave blank, it show's the goodbye message.

conventer.STICKER_DESC: Converts the sticker to a photo.
conventer.XMEDIA_DESC: It is a plugin with more than 25 media tools.
conventer.T_FALSE:
*„Äò‚ùå„ÄôIncorrect Blend Effect Entered!*
*üîé Existing Commands:*

*$dodge* - Applies a pink color filter to the video.
*$multiply* - Applies a green color filter to the video.
*$grainmerge* - Increases the contrast of the video.
*$and* - Applies black lightning effect according to the speed of the video.
*$or* - Applies a white lightning effect according to the speed of the video.
*$burn* - Applies green contrast to video.
*$difference* - Shows the differences by applying green relief to the video.
*$grainextract* - Shows the differences by applying gray relief to the video.
*$divide* - Demonstrates the differences by applying a pink relief to the video.
*$xor* - Applies both green relief and lightning effect to video.
*$hardmix* - Mixes the colors of the video into a yellow and red tone.
*$negation* - Turns the dynamics of the video to pink.
conventer.T_NOT:
*üí≠ You Need To Enter Any Blend Effects!
*üîé Existing Commands:*

*$dodge* - Applies a pink color filter to the video.
*$multiply* - Applies a green color filter to the video.
*$grainmerge* - Increases the contrast of the video.
*$and* - Applies black lightning effect according to the speed of the video.
*$or* - Applies a white lightning effect according to the speed of the video.
*$burn* - Applies green contrast to video.
*$difference* - Shows the differences by applying green relief to the video.
*$grainextract* - Shows the differences by applying gray relief to the video.
*$divide* - Demonstrates the differences by applying a pink relief to the video.
*$xor* - Applies both green relief and lightning effect to video.
*$hardmix* - Mixes the colors of the video into a yellow and red tone.
*$negation* - Turns the dynamics of the video to pink.
conventer.T_DESC: Applies the selected TBlend effect to videos.
conventer.CAPTION: *M·¥Ä·¥Ö·¥á B è ‚ö° Ôº°ÔΩåÔΩêÔΩàÔΩÅ-Ôº∏ üöÄ*
